snippet: The inquiry, still in an early stage, continues a trend by Italian prosecutors of paying more attention to the tax filings of big international companies.
abstract: Italian prosecutors open investigation into whether Apple paid all its taxes in the country; inquiry, still in an early stage, continues a trend by Italian authorities of paying more attention to the tax filings of big international companies.

byline.contributor: Nick Wingfield contributed reporting from Seattle.

lead_paragraph: The inquiry, still in an early stage, continues a trend by Italian prosecutors of paying more attention to the tax filings of big international companies.

headline.main: Tax Authorities in Italy Put Apple Under Investigation
headline.print_headline: Seeking Out Tax Avoiders, Italy Takes a Closer Look at Apple
